SA14n1147:1: sarvākārajñatādhigamo na vinā mārgajñatāparijñāneneti mārgajñatāṃ vaktumāha |
SA14n1147:7: kṛtakāyādisāmagrīko vihitasamyakpraṇāmo vā svāsane niṣaṇaḥ samupaviṣṭaḥ |
SA14n1147:9: sahe lokadhātāvā samantāt patiḥ sahāpatirnāyako devaputro brahmāpi caturthadhyānaprabhavaḥ |
SA14n1147:11: ti nyāyādyathākramaṃ prathamādidhyānatrayasya vināśena tasyaiva cirasthāyitayā patitvābhimānādityeke |
SA14n1147:13: pi sattvā ihopapadyeranniti praṇidhānānantaraṃ puṇyādikṣayādapareṣāṃ kākatālīyanyāyena tatra samutpāde'
SA14n1147:47: evamabhyarthitaḥ subhūtirvigatābhimāna evotpādita bodhicitto mārgajñatādhigame bhavya iti viṣayapratiniyamadvāreṇāha |
SA14n1147:52: triyānavyavasthānamābhiprāyikaṃ na lākṣaṇikamiti nyāyādanuttarasamyaksambodhiparyavasāna eva sarvo jana ityato vītarāgetarayogināpi buddhatvaprāptaye mārgajñatā bhāvanīyeti vyāptimādarśayituṃ śrāvakayānādipratipannānāmanuttarasamyaksambodhyabhājanatvenāniyatagotrāṇāṃ prathamato mahābodhāvākarṣaṇārthamanyeṣāñca pravṛttānāṃ sandhāraṇārthamityābhiprāyikaṃ vacanamāha |
SA14n1147:56: dhigatāḥ samyaktvaniyāmaṃ svaśrāvakādidarśanādimārgaṃ na te bhavyā yogyā buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāyetyanuttarasamyaksambodhinimittaṃ cittamutpādayitum |
SA14n1147:57: yatra bālo'pi janaḥ saktastatra kathaṃ viditāryamārgāḥ śrāvakā na śaktā iti |
SA14n1147:62: bhavyā eva te punaḥ punarabhīkṣṇaṃ saṃsaraṇāya janmagrahaṇāya |
SA14n1147:63: tataścānuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayitumabhavyā iti sambandhaḥ | etaduktam |
SA14n1147:67: punarjanmagrahaṇe sati dānādinā sattvārthakriyāyāmabhyāsādbodhicittaṃ suviśuddhaṃ tathāgatapadaprāpakamupajāyate |
SA14n1147:68: ato mahāśrāvakāḥ samucchinnakleśatayā punarjanmākhyamūlakāraṇānivṛttyā tādṛgvidhaṃ cittaratnaṃ kāryātmakaṃ notpādayituṃ śaktā nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt |
SA14n1147:85: tathāpi na punaḥ kuśalamūlasya bodhicitaprabhavabuddhatvasyāntarāyamasambhavitvena vicchedaṃ mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ karomi |
SA14n1147:88: yasmādviśiṣṭebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitrādibhyo viśiṣṭatamā eva bodhicittādayo dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyāḥ |
SA14n1147:89: dagdhapunarbhavakleśānāmapi ca śrāvakapratyekajinānāṃ kathaṃ tāsu tāsu gatiṣu janma na virudhyata iti na vaktavyam |
SA14n1147:91: sa samyagātmasnehavato duḥkhasukhatyāgāptivāñchāpūrvakastadyathā kāmināṃ strīguṇaparigrahastathā ceśvarādyanadhiṣṭhitasya jantorabhiratipūrvako graho'
SA14n1147:92: yaṃ garbhasthānaparigraha ityevaṃ svabhāvahetunā kleśānāṃ traidhātukotpattiṃ prati sāmarthyaṃ pratipādyate |
SA14n1147:94: pi pradīpanirvāṇaprakhyanirvāṇasaṃjñino vyativṛtatraidhātukajanmānaścyuticittānantaraṃ pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣṭhanāśrave dhātau samāhitā eva padmapuṭeṣu jāyante |
SA14n1147:95: tataste'mitābhādisambuddhabhāskarakararaikliṣṭatamohānaye prabodhitā bodhicittamutpādya muktyavasthāyāṃ narakādicārikāmiva gatiṃ gacchantaḥ krameṇa bodhisambhāraṃ sambhṛtya lokaguravo bhavanti ityāgamānniścitamiti |
SA14n1147:96: punarbhavakleśakāraṇanivṛttyā traidhātukotpattikāryaṃ nivartate natvanāśravadhātūtpattiriti kathaṃ virodhastasmāt sarvasmin yāne sarvathaikamahāyānasamavasaraṇadeśanaiva nyāyyā lakṣyate |
SA14n1147:100: tathā "ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitīyaṃ na vidyate"ityādi |
SA14n1147:108: na teṣāmasti nirvāṇaṃ kintu janma bhavatraye |
SA14n1147:116: agocaro'pyevamartho vispaṣṭavāgbhiḥ pratyakṣeṇeva prakāśyata iti vismaye sādhu sādhviti dvirabhidhānam |
SA14n1147:117: yadi vā svavivakṣitasya vyaktaṃ dyotanāt praharṣe punaḥ sādhuriti vacanaṃ śobhanamevaitadyadvadasīti |
SA14n1147:122: yetvavakrāntā ityādi vākyaṃ nītārthamapi tu khalvityādivacanaṃ neyārthamato vyāptyartho buddhagotrakānadhikṛtyeti |
SA14n1147:127: pūrvasminnekayānadeśanāpakṣe ye śrāvakādibodhyadhigamapūrvikāṃ mahābodhimadhigacchanti te tāvatkālaṃ vyapadeśena śrāvakādigotrakā vyapadiṣṭāḥ |
SA14n1147:128: prathamatastu pramuditābhūmyadhigamānukrameṇānuttarabodhibhājo mahāyānagotrakā iti gotrabhedo na vidyata ityalaṃ prasaṅgena |
SA14n1147:140: yathetyasmadartha iti sambandho yadi vā yathā'
SA14n1147:146: carannityāsaṃsāraṃ sattvārthakaraṇapravṛttatvenotpāditabodhicittasya sarvathā mārgajñatayā kleśāprahāṇamityasyāḥ svabhāvena kleśavaśitāmāsādya dīrghakālaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ sannityanena svabhāvaḥ kathitaḥ |
SA14n1147:156: yathoktasvabhāvasya bhūtakoṭerasākṣātkaraṇena prajñopāyakauśalena ca dānādibhiraparigṛhītāsamādāpitāparimocitasattvaparigrahaṇasamādāpanaparimocanādikarma kurvatā sambhṛtasambhāreṇeti kāritramāveditamanyathā'
SA14n1147:166: ko'tra pratibandho yathā bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ śrāvakairanuparigṛhīto bhavadbhirapi śrāvakairanye bodhisattvāstathānuparigrahītavyā iti |
SA14n1147:169: ayamāśayo yathā pūrvaśrāvakaiḥ svabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāmasmadarthe brahmacaryacaraṇaṃ jātamiti pūrvakṛtopakārāvabodhakāraṇena teṣāṃ pratyupakāracikīrṣayā tadantike'
SA14n1147:170: smadarthaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caran bhagavān bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ priyatamaḥ śākyamuniranuparigṛhītaḥ |
SA14n1147:171: asmābhirapi śrāvakaiḥ śākyādhirājasya bodhisattvāvasthāyāmasmadarthe brahmacaryacaraṇaṃ jātamiti pūrvakṛtopakārāvabodhakāraṇena bhagavataḥ pratyupakārābhiprāyādyuṣmadantike'
SA14n1147:174: evaṃ hi vayaṃ bhagavataḥ kṛtajñā iti |
SA14n1147:187: viṣayo niyato vyāptiḥ svabhāvastasya karma ca ||1 iti |
SA14n1147:191: yasmānmārgajñatādhikāre svamārgaparyantagatimāsādya yānāntaravineyasattvārthaṃ pratyasākṣātkaraṇena sahetukamārgopadeśaparicayakauśalyāt sarvamārgāḥ paripūrayitavyā bodhisattvena tasmāt kāraṇācchrāvakamārgaṃ bhāṣiṣye'
SA14n1147:192: haṃ kauśika śṛṇviti sambandhaḥ yathā deve varṣatyapyavāṅmukhe ghaṭe na kiñcidapyudakaṃ praviśati tadvattvamavāṅmukho bhūtvā'
SA14n1147:195: yathottānāśucighaṭe yadudakaṃ praviśati tat sarvamaśucībhavatyakāryopagataṃ tadvattvaṃ viparītapratipattyā śrutamaśucīkurvan mā śṛṇvityāha |
SA14n1147:197: yathottānaśucichidraghaṭaṃ praviśatyudakaṃ na tu tiṣṭhati tadvattvamasthirapratipattyā mā śṛṇu kintu tathā śṛṇu yathā paṭutarānubhavadvāreṇa cetasi sthirībhavatītyāha |
SA14n1147:209: yathā yena prakāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakamārgasvabhāvāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ pratipattavyam |
SA14n1147:212: duḥkhādicaturāryasatyasambandhināmākārāṇāmanupalambhe sāmānyoktāvapi viśeṣapratītiḥ pūrvācāryasampradāyādyanusāreṇa bhavatīti nātra sandehaḥ |
SA14n1147:236: ryaśrāvako nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya ca pratipanno bhavatītyāgamārthaḥ kathitaḥ syāt |
SA14n1147:245: tathāca satyamunā krameṇa mahāyāne kecidākārāḥ paryāyataḥ kecicca svarūpato nirdiṣṭā iti nāśrāvakamārgatvaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA14n1147:246: tataścaiṣāṃ caturāryasatyasaṅgatānāṃ svabhāvānupalambhabhāvanayā mārgajñatādhikāre śrāvakāṇāṃ mārgo bodhisattvena parijñeya iti |
SA14n1147:247: asya cārthasaṃkṣepasya pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ spaṣṭamupalabhyamānatvānna vipratipattiḥ kāryā |
SA14n1147:253: yasmānnirvedhabhāgīyādhigamapurvakaṃ catuḥsatyaparijñānaṃ tasmādbodhisattvenoṣmādhigamārthaṃ rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvena śūnyam |
SA14n1147:254: evaṃ vedanādayo yā ca rūpasya śūnyatā yā ca vedanādīnāmadvayametadadvaidhīkāramityabhedato bhāvanīyam |
SA14n1147:258: iha subhūte bodhisattvaḥ śūnyatayā sarvadharmānabhedataḥ pratyavekṣata"ityādi ||
SA14n1147:265: eṣāmeva pañcaskandhānāṃ na cakṣupītyādinā na smṛtyupasthāneṣvityādinā na śrotaāpattiphala ityādinā ca yathākramaṃ sāśravobhayānāśravavattvena prabhedaṃ darśayatīti hārakārthaḥ |
SA14n1147:267: yāvanna manovijñāna ityatra yāvadgrahaṇena ghrāṇādivijñānātideśaṃ karoti |
SA14n1147:268: na buddhatve sthātavyamityanuttarasamyaksambuddhatve yadyādhārātmake rūpādau na sthātavyamevaṃ tarhi vyāvṛttiphalatvāt sarvavākyānāṃ rūpādikamiti tādātmyenāvasthānaṃ prāptamiti kasyacidāśaṅkāniṣedhārthamāha |
SA14n1147:273: nupalambhabhāvanayā rūpāderasattvādādhārabhāvanānupapattistasmādeva ca kāraṇāt svarūpavirahe tādātmyenānyathā copagamo na yuktarūpaḥ |
SA14n1147:274: sannihitavineyajanaviparyāsanirācikīrṣayā tu kathañcidādhārabhāvena nirdeśānna vyāvṛttiphalamāstheyamato mūrdhādhigamārthaṃ sarvathānupalambhabhāvanā rūpādīnāṃ vidheyeti |
SA14n1147:308: imam manuṣyalokamāgamya saṃprāpya duḥkhasya rāgādikleśagaṇasyāntaṃ vināśaṃ kariṣyati |
SA14n1147:313: na vidyanta upadhayaḥ skandhāḥ sarvarāgādiprahāṇāvaśeṣībhūtatvena śeṣā yasminnirvāṇe tattathoktam |
SA14n1147:319: yasya ca pudgalasya yāvanmātrakleśaprakāraprahāṇena pratipannakatvādivyavasthā tatprāgevoktamiti na punarupanyasyate |
SA14n1147:323: ātmānamekaṃ pratinimittabhūtaṃ svabodhiṃ buddhavān svayamiti pratyekabuddhaḥ naivaṃ śrāvake'
SA14n1147:339: yadvātra lokadhātāvarthakriyāmadhikṛtya taduktamanyatra tu nirmāṇameghaiḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvārthakāraṇādaprameyādivacanamaviruddham |
SA14n1147:341: tra vilakṣaṇaiva deśaneti na yānāntareṇa saha virodho vācyaḥ |
SA14n1147:344: keṣāṃciddānādibhirabhyudayadharmaṃ niṣpādya parinirvāpyeti śrāvakādinirvāṇe kāṃścinniḥśreyasadharme pratiṣṭhāpya |
SA14n1147:345: śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksambuddhatvaniyatāniti yasya kuśalanirvedhabhāgīyāderadhigamānniyamenābhyudayaniḥśreyasadharmo prāpyate tatra hetau sthāpanādanyānniyatānniyatagotrasthāniti yāvat |
SA14n1147:352: tathā hi ye samagrasthitihetavaste nityamuparatasthitidharmāṇo na bhavanti |
SA14n1147:361: na yatnena vinā hāniryatnastu nādoṣadarśanādvivṛddhatadrasāsvādalampaṭasya tasyāmeva buddheḥ pakṣapātāditi |
SA14n1147:367: "yasya kasyacidānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā ākāṅkṣan sa kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā,
SA14n1147:368: tathāgatasyānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā ākāṅkṣan sa tathāgatakalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ veti" |
SA14n1147:371: ayaṃ hi hetuphalayoḥ dharmo yat prakṛṣṭāddhetoḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ phalamaprakṛṣṭāccāprakṛṣṭamiti |
SA14n1147:378: tadutpādayannevānyasyāpi yadi nimittatāṃ pratipadyate tadā na doṣaḥ |
SA14n1147:385: kiṃ buddharūpavineyā eva sattvā vidyante kiṃ vā rūpāntaravineyā apīti |
SA14n1147:387: āśrayante hi dayāvidheyacetasaśceṣṭāntaramapi janahitasampādanāya yathā bhagavataiva cakravartirūpamāsthitam |
SA14n1147:396: tadidamajñāpakaṃ nahīdaṃ paṭhyate kvacit sarveṣveva lokadhātuṣu buddharūpasandarśanavineyāḥ sattvā na santīti |
SA14n1147:409: pi satyadhanapālanāya pratijñātārthanirvahaṇamavaśyaṃ tayā sarvaśaktiparikṣayeṇāpi sampādayanto dṛśyante |
SA14n1147:411: pratihatajñānaśaktayo na sampādayantīti kaḥ punaḥ sacetanaḥ śraddadhyāt |
SA14n1147:424: ata eva dayāmayasya tadāśayasyāparyantamevāvasthānamanyathā na pratijñānurūpamanuṣṭhānaṃ bhavet |
SA14n1147:426: tathā hīyaṃ mahākaruṇā sarvasattvaduḥkhaparitrāṇecchākārā tadasyāḥ subhāvitāyāḥ kuto'
SA14n1147:429: na vicchedaḥ kintu ye tatkālabhāvino buddhavineyāḥ subhadrāntāste sarve vinītāḥ |
SA14n1147:441: svalpataraḥ sa kāla ityapi na samyak |
SA14n1147:442: yenābhipretaphalāhitacetaso na kālasya dairdhyamadairdhyaṃ vā gaṇayanti |
SA14n1147:445: pi na yatnaḥ prāpnoti bahūnāṃ lokābhyuddharaṇāśayānāṃ vyāpāradarśanādetaireva vyāpṛtāḥ kimatra mayā kartavyamityāśayāt |
SA14n1147:451: tiṣṭhantyeva parādhīnā yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā ||
SA14n1147:455: tathāhi trāṇārthaḥ śaraṇārtho varṇyate yaśca buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati |
SA14n1147:465: tadupadiṣṭasya pravacanaratnasya trātumadyāpi sāmarthyamastīti tasyāpi sāmarthyamucyata iti |
SA14n1147:466: yadyevaṃ na mukhyaṃ tarhi taccharaṇaṃ syāt |
SA14n1147:467: na hi tatkāryasya sāmarthyaṃ tasya bhavati |
SA14n1147:469: tasya cādhunā sāmarthyamekāntena na pracyutamiṣyata iti |
SA14n1147:471: ko vāyamāgamadharāṇāmasthānanirbandho yadamī niṣkāraṇavairiṇo yuktyā gamāntaropetamapyābhiprāyikamāgamārthamullaṅkhya bhagavannirvṛtipratipādanāya sotsāhāḥ santiṣṭhante |
SA14n1147:472: bhagavataḥ parinirvāṇābhāve kathaṃ dhātavo dṛśyanta iti cet |
SA14n1147:482: avikale kāraṇe sati kāryāsambhavāyogo bādhaka iti viparyaye bādhakapramāṇānnānaikāntikaḥ |
SA14n1147:485: pi yaugapadyenāpi bahubuddharūpavineyasattvārtheṣu bhagavantastathāgatāstulyakāraṇavṛttitvācchilāvastabdhamaṇḍūkoddharaṇena pṛthagjanabhūmisthitā iva dayālavaḥ pravartante |
SA14n1147:496: ata evaṃ tadrūpasannipāta vineyajanāsambhavānnaikasmin samavadhānamata eva ca naikalokadhātau yugapadbahutathāgatotpattiḥ |
SA14n1147:509: tadānena bodhisattvena kathaṃ kena punaḥ prakāreṇa sthātavyaṃ pratipattavyam |
SA14n1147:515: yattathāgatasthānaṃ tat kiṃ tvaṃ manyase budhyase |
SA14n1147:523: pi bhagavān kathaṃ na kvacitsthita iti |
SA14n1147:528: tasmānna kvacidupalambhayogena sthita iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
SA14n1147:538: saṃvṛtyā sthānamasthānaṃ vā prajñaptaṃ bhagavata iti matiḥ |
SA14n1147:553: tathā śikṣiṣya iti maulāvasthāyāmevamanena śikṣitavyamiti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
SA14n1147:555: viśeṣādhigamalābhena suṣṭhu sthito māyāpuruṣasyevānabhiniveśayogena pṛṣṭhāvasthāyāmevamanena śikṣitavyamityatrāpi sambandhaḥ |
SA14n1147:563: yasmāttathāgatena bodhimabhisambudhya tattvato na keciddharmāḥ samupalabdhāstasmānmāyāsvabhāvā evāmī bhāvāḥ pratibhāntīti |
SA14n1147:571: pi śrāvakebhyaḥ kathaṃ prativiśiṣṭāste yena teṣāṃ mārgabheda ityāśaṅkya vaiśiṣṭyapratipādanārthaṃ tāvadāha |
SA14n1147:573: yāni tānīti nipātasamudāyatvena yāni kānicit pūrvopaśrutānītyarthaḥ |
SA14n1147:585: pratyekabuddhāḥ punaḥ svayaṃ pūrvaśrutādyabhisaṃskāreṇa paropadeśaṃ pratyanapekṣāḥ svabodhimadhigacchantyatasteṣāṃ buddhādyupadeśanairarthakamityekaṃ vaiśiṣṭyam |
SA14n1147:586: yatastasmātkāraṇāt pratyekabuddhānadhikṛtya yadbhāṣaṇādi na tat sārthakaṃ vijñāyata iti vākyārthaḥ |
SA14n1147:593: nyathā na pratyekabuddhānārabhyāryasubhūtinā kiñciduktamiti teṣāṃ kathamayaṃ vikalpaḥ syāt |
SA14n1147:596: na vijñāyata iti yaduktaṃ tat sādhūktamiti śeṣaḥ |
SA14n1147:598: vismaye ca vivāde ca kope dainye'vadhāraṇe |
SA14n1147:602: tathā hītyādi yasmādaśrotṛsaṃskārakaṃ vākyaṃ bruvāṇaḥ kathaṃ nonmattaḥ syāditi nyāyena svayambodhātsvayaṃbhuvāṃ bodhāya na kiñcidatra bhāṣaṇādi śrūyate |
SA14n1147:603: tasmāttadarthāya yadbhāṣaṇādi tanna vijñāpaya iti sādhūktam |
SA14n1147:604: sālāpadharmadeśanayā parān kuśale śrāvakāḥ pravartayantīti śabdoccāraṇadharmadeśanayā śrotṛbhiḥ kriyate vaktṛjñānasāmarthyāvabodhaḥ |
SA14n1147:605: pratyekabuddhāḥ punarjñeyāvaraṇaikadeśagrāhyavikalpaprahāṇādaśabdoccāradharmadeśanayā svādhigatajñānādisāmarthyena parān daśakuśalādau pravartayantyatasteṣāṃ jñānasya parānavabodhatayā gāmbhīryaṃ dvitīyaṃ vaiśiṣṭyamiti kṛtvā vacanātmakamapi kāryaliṅgabhāṣaṇādi na kiñcidatra tajjñānasvarūpapratipādanāya sūcyate |
SA14n1147:608: pratyekabuddhānāṃ svayambodhāt paropadeśanairarthakamityevaṃ rūpaṃ vitarkaṃ parihāradvāreṇa parihariṣyatyevāyamāryasubhūtirityasmākaṃ ceto jātaṃ yāvat tamaparihṛtyānyadeva jñānagāmbhīryaṃ kathayatītyāhurdevaputrāḥ |
SA14n1147:618: "eta eva daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svayamabhisambodhatayā gambhīrā idaṃ pratyayānubodhena ca pratyekabuddhajñānaṃ nivartayantī"ti |
SA14n1147:626: kathaṃ dharmadeśanā ca nāmāpravyāhārā ca yena vacanakāryaliṅgābhāvena jñānagāmbhīryaṃ sidhyatītyapi na vaktavyam |
SA14n1147:627: yato nāvitarkya nāvicārya vācaṃ bhāṣata ityālāpavikṣepau |
SA14n1147:629: vikṣepaśca santānakṣobhaṃ gāḍhamādadhātīti matvā yathā buddhena bhagavatā prāgbodhisattvabhūtenaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ pravartitam |
SA14n1147:632: tathā buddhatvasāmyāt pratyekabuddhairatasteṣāmapi svabodhyadhigamāvasthāyāṃ pūrvaṃ praṇidhānādisāmarthena yasminnarthe yena prakāreṇa yasya śravaṇecchā tasya vijñāne tenaiva prakāreṇāśabdo'
SA14n1147:639: śuśrūṣā yasya yasyārthe yatra yatra yathā yathā |
SA14n1147:641: pi tasya tasya tathā tathā ||7 || iti
SA14n1147:648: evaṃ tarhi nitarāṃ dūrāddūratarādikaṃ praviśāmīti matiḥ |
SA14n1147:651: imāṃ mārgajñatāṃ dharmanidhyānakṣamaṇaviṣayāmaprāpya sa pudgalo na sambhavatyanyathādhigamābhāvādityanena ca mārgajñatāṃ sarvamārgaviṣayiṇīmāha |
SA14n1147:655: sau viśiṣṭo mārgastatsvabhāvā mārgajñatā kintarhi śrāvakādimārgasvabhāvāpīti |
SA14n1147:669: vastudharmo hyeṣa yat svalakṣaṇe vastuni sati tadgrāhakaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānasvalakṣaṇamutpadyate |
SA14n1147:671: grāhakavikalpasya punaranādikālīnanirudhyamānarūpādigrāhakavikalpajñānasamākṣiptasvasantānavāsanāprabodhajanmatvānnāyaṃ niyamo grāhyavikalpe satyeva samudaya iti |
SA14n1147:672: tasmānmāyāsvabhāvanirmitapadārthasamānā eva te vitathaprakhyātirūpagrāhakavikalpena saṅgatatvāt pratyekabuddhāgrāhakatvenaiveṣṭavyā iti |
SA14n1147:677: samāhitāsamāhitāvasthāyāṃ te pratyekabuddhā yathākramaṃ naiva śroṣyantiḥ na sākṣātkariṣyanti grāhakavikalpākāreṇeti śeṣaḥ |
SA14n1147:681: māyānirmitasadṛśā iti kenacidākāreṇeti sādṛśyavacanāt sattvānāṃ māyāsvabhāvatā nirākṛteti prasaṅgāgatavikalpārthamāha |
SA14n1147:684: kinna te māyāvitatharūpāstataśca tāttvikasattvāstikaparidīpitaṃ na samyaknirdeśa iti matiḥ |
SA14n1147:687: yathā gajāde rūpeṇa māyā mṛcchakalādibhyo vivekenānupalambhamānatvānnānyā |
SA14n1147:696: yathā māyā tathā cāmī sattvādayo bhāvā iti svabhāvahetunā kasyacitprasiddhenārthena prasiddho'
SA14n1147:699: pi sattvā māyātmakā evāto na kiñcittāttvikasattvāstitvaṃ paridīpitamiti |
SA14n1147:704: na vidyate dvaidhīkāro nānātvaṃ yasya tattathoktam |
SA14n1147:706: tadayaṃ vākyārtho yasmādalīkarūpatayā māyopamāste sattvāstasmānmāyā ca sattvāścādvayametadadvaidhīkāram |
SA14n1147:712: vyāptāvevaṃ pratipāditāyāṃ kathaṃ māyopamo bhagavān sarvākāraguṇasampado heturityāha |
SA14n1147:718: yatra hi nāma nirvāṇamapi prativiśiṣṭaṃ dharmakāyamadvayajñānasvabhāvaṃ māyāsvapnasamānaṃ vadāmi |
SA14n1147:719: tatra kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmaṃ rūpakāyaṃ na vadāmi |
SA14n1147:722: yasmādyathoktasvabhāva eva bhagavānabhimukhīkriyamāṇaḥ sarvaguṇasampado hetuḥ pramāṇabādhitasvarūpatvenānyathā viparyāsa iti bhāvaḥ |
SA14n1147:725: anyathā tīrthikānāmiva prādeśikaśūnyatāsadbhāvena bhāvābhyupagamato muktyanupapattirityabhiprāyavān pariharannāha |
SA14n1147:730: nirvāṇādanyaḥ kaścit prativiśiṣṭo dharmo na sambhavati |
SA14n1147:732: yadi nirvāṇādapi kaścidanyo viśiṣṭataro dharmaḥ sambhavet tadā tamapi dharmaṃ māyādisadṛśaṃ vadeyamiti |
SA14n1147:736: sa hetuḥ sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ kleśotpattirna taṃ vinā |
SA14n1147:742: pi pratyekabuddhānāṃ viśiṣṭo mārga iti kathanāya praśnayannāha |
SA14n1147:744: grāhyagrāhakavikalpayoryathākramaṃ prahāṇāprahāṇamityevaṃrūpeṇāsyāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgātmakāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kathyamānāyāḥ kīdṛgvidhagotrakāḥ pudgalāḥ pratyeṣakā grāhakā bhaviṣyanti |
SA14n1147:747: avinivartanīyā iti nirvedhabhāgīyādhigamenāvaivartikāḥ pratyekabodhau ta eva svabodhyabhilāṣādbodhisattvāḥ |
SA14n1147:752: arhanto vā kṣīṇāśravā iti prahīṇasvadarśanamārgāvaraṇatvena pūjārhāḥ |
SA14n1147:753: anena ca padatrayeṇa pratyekabodhau yathākramaṃ samudānītagotrakā dharmatāpratilabdhagotrakāsta eva niyatagotrakāḥ pudgalā ityākhyātam |
SA14n1147:758: pi pratyekabuddhāḥ kathaṃ na kecit pratyeṣikā iti |
SA14n1147:761: atreti pratyekabuddhamārgādhigamakāle paropadeśanairarthakyāt svayaṃbodhena pratyekabuddhānāmiti bhāvaḥ |
SA14n1147:767: tasmādyenaiva kāraṇena nairarthakyena sūcanādi na kriyate |
SA14n1147:768: tenaiva kāraṇena kaścit pratyeṣako na bhaviṣyati |
SA14n1147:770: yathā'vidyamānasvabhāvamapi nirmitapuṣpaṃ pratiniyatadeśādirūpeṇāvicāraikaramaṇīyatayā pratibhāsate tadvadvastubhūtādhāramantareṇāpi pratiniyatādhigamadharmaprāptiriti sūcanāyā' '
SA14n1147:806: yasmānna manonirjātāni tattvataḥ kānicitpuṣpāṇi grāhyagrāhakabhāvasyālīkatvāditi śeṣaḥ |
SA14n1147:808: anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇīti vacanena puṣpāṇāṃ svarūpamapratiṣiddhaṃ janmaniṣedhāttarhi nityatvamabhyupagataṃ taccāyuktamityāha |
SA14n1147:815: tatra grāhyavikalpaprahāṇena pratyekabuddhādhigamaṃ śrāvakebhyo viśinaṣṭi grāhakavikalpaprahāṇābhāvena ca pratyekabuddhebhyo'
SA14n1147:817: ādhāreṇa cādhigamasyāsādhāraṇyamiti viśiṣṭaḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ mārgo yathoktaśrāvakacatuḥsatyākārānupalambhabhāvanayā yathāvastu pratītyasamutpādānugatayā bodhisattvena parījñeyaḥ |
SA14n1147:905: evaṃ samudaye nirodhe mārge pratipattavyamityete ṣoḍaśacittakṣaṇā darśanamārgaḥ |
SA14n1147:910: tathāhi prayogamārge duḥkhasatyādhipateryasya dharmasya pūrvavicāraṇāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pratyātmaṃ duḥkhasatyānubhāvijñānamanāśravaṃ yena duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaṃ kleśaṃ prajahāti |
SA14n1147:912: yena jñānena kṣāntyanantaraṃ vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti taducyate duḥkhadharmajñānam |
SA14n1147:913: duḥkhadharmajñānasyānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau duḥkhadharmajñāne cānvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇāmiti pratyātmaṃ yatpratyakṣānubhāvijñānamanāśravaṃ taducyate duḥkhānvayajñānakṣāntiḥ |
SA14n1147:916: evamavaśiṣṭeṣvapi satyeṣu yathāyogaṃ kṣāntayo jñānāni ca veditavyānīti ṣoḍaśakṣaṇika eva darśanamārgo yuktaḥ |
SA14n1147:922: pyapūrvadarśanavaikalyādanvayajñānakṣaṇo na darśanamārga iti dvādaśakṣaṇika eva syāt |
SA14n1147:933: ata eva nirodhaḥ sakṣātkṛtastasya cānyathānupapattyā mārgo bhāvitaḥ |
SA14n1147:939: muktistvanupalambhadṛṣṭestatparikarmabhūtatvena tadartheva pariśiṣṭākārabhāvaneti yathoditavidhinā niḥsvabhāvā nirātmānaḥ śūnyā iti vā sarvadharmān bhāvayato bhāvanābalaniṣpattau |
SA14n1147:941: ko'nyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syādyaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate ||
SA14n1147:944: nanvekasminneva kṣaṇe sarvākārasya pratividdhatvādākārāntareṇa darśanamārge bhāvanāntarānupapatteḥ pratipannakatvādivyavasthā kathamiti śreyo niryāṇamārgānusāriṇāṃ matiḥ |
SA14n1147:954: tatraiva tasya tatpratibaddhāvaraṇaprahāṇāt prāmāṇyaṃ nānyatra kṣaṇikatvādivat |
SA14n1147:955: evamāryāṇāṃ pṛthagjanebhyaḥ ko viśeṣa ityapi na vaktavyam |
SA14n1147:974: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
SA14n1147:988: tadubhayavyatiriktaparadharmābhāvāt kathaṃ rūpādāvanyatra ca prajñāpāramitā na gaveṣitavyeti |
SA14n1147:993: ato rūpādyaviśuddhamādhārātmakaṃ viśiṣṭakāraṇaṃ suviśuddhasya tathāgatasya na bhavatīti |
SA14n1147:995: tadvyatiriktānyadharmasya tāttvikatve tathaiva viparyāsa iti nāpyanyatra |
SA14n1147:999: atastayoḥ paryāyeṇāvasthiterananujñānamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyata iti |
SA14n1147:1005: iti nyāyādrūpādikāraṇamahattvādyanupapattau tadālambananirjātāyāḥ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā mahattvādikamiti |
SA14n1147:1021: pūrvavadākāśāparimāṇatayā teṣāmaparimāṇatā rūpāderniḥsvabhāvatvena śāśvatocchedādyantābhāvādanantatetyevaṃ sarvadharmālambane yathākramaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānam |
SA14n1147:1036: evaṃ prathamārambaṇānantatayā hetvākāraṃ pratiṣidhya samudayākārapratiṣedhārthaṃ dvitīyārambaṇānantatāṃ kathayannāha |
SA14n1147:1042: nanu yadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi yatkāryaṃ tattasya heturiti pūrvānto dṛśyate |
SA14n1147:1073: yadyucitarūpeṇāpi prakāradvayena sattvānantatā na bhavati kena punastarhi prakāreṇetyāha |
SA14n1147:1095: yatretyādi yatra saṃvṛtimātreṇa kācittāttvikī sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā tatra kā sattvānantatā'
SA14n1147:1123: ato yatra svalakṣaṇe saṅketaḥ kṛto na tena vyavahārastatkālānanupāyitvāditi śabdavācyakalpanākalaṅkānaṅkitarūpatvādādiviśuddhatvam |
SA14n1147:1124: yena ca vyavahāro na tatra saṅketaḥ kṛtastasya prāgdṛṣṭatvāditi |
SA14n1147:1127: evaṃ hi tattvato vācyatvaṃ nirākṛtaṃ na tu vasturūpam |
SA14n1147:1129: yogādinā sattvānantatā paridīpiteti śakrābhiprāya eva vyākhyāta ityapare nānumanyanta |
SA14n1147:1139: ṛṣayo viśvāmitraprabhṛtayaḥ kiyanmātreṇa yathoktadeśanayā grāhyagrāhakanairātmyaṃ pratividhyopetya dānamudānamadhigamaharṣavacanamudānayanti smodīritavantaḥ |
SA14n1147:1160: "prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasya vastuto dharmadhātusvabhāvatayā rūpādīnāṃ tathāgatatvāvadhāraṇamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane samudaye dharmajñānamutpadyata"iti |
SA14n1147:1180: tathāgato'rhan samyaksambuddha ityebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ śāstṛtvasampadaṃ darśayati |
SA14n1147:1183: tatra yathaiva te dharmā vyavasthitāstathaiva gadanāttathā dharmadaiśikatvādvaktṛtvasampaduktā |
SA14n1147:1191: tadevamaviparītadharmadaiśikatvena sarvakleśaprahāṇena sarvākāradharmāvabodhena ca śāstṛtvasampadasādhāraṇā paripūrṇā ca bhagavataḥ kathitā |
SA14n1147:1195: śrāvakapratyekabuddhāstu yadyapi bhūtaśāstāraḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇānna tu sarvākāraśāstāraḥ sarvākārasarvadharmānavabodhāt |
SA14n1147:1196: bhagavān punaryathoktanyāyena bhūtaśāstā sarvākāraśāstā ceti pratipāditam |
SA14n1147:1207: prajñāyāḥ pūrvaparikarmabhūtatvena puraścaraṇaṃ caraṇamiti kṛtvā vidyāyāstu pūrvagrahaṇaṃ tatpariśuddhyā śīlasamādhyoḥ pariśuddhitaḥ |
SA14n1147:1208: tathā hi prajñayā cakṣuṣeva paśyaṃstābhyāñca śīlasamādhibhyāṃ caraṇābhyāmiva gacchan gantavyamanuprāpnotīti vidyācaraṇaśabdena tistraḥ śikṣā nirdiśyante |
SA14n1147:1211: tathā hi lokottareṇa mārgeṇa śobhanaṃ jñāna prahāṇasampadaṃ gataḥ |
SA14n1147:1216: tathā hyātmaviparyāsena bāhyavītarāgā na śobhanaṃ gatāḥ |
SA14n1147:1218: aśaikṣāḥ punaḥ sarvajñeyeṣu jñānavibandhānna niḥśeṣaṃ gatāḥ |
SA14n1147:1222: tathā hi bhagavāṃstriḥkṛtvo rātrestriḥkṛtvo divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati ko hīyate ko vardhata ityādibhirākārairdvitīyaṃ bhavyavinayanaṃ karma darśayati |
SA14n1147:1224: bhavyābhavyāllokān vyavalokya bhagavān ye puruṣā eva damyā damanārhā damayituṃ vā śakyā bhavyāstān vinayati |
SA14n1147:1229: durdamānāmapi keṣāñcit puruṣadamyānāṃ tīvrarāgadveṣamohamānānāmāryasundarānandāṅgulīmāloruvilvākāśyapamahārājakapphiṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ vināyaka iti pradarśanārtham |
SA14n1147:1230: tacca bhavyavinayanaṃ karma yatra sthitaṃ taddarśayati |
SA14n1147:1233: tathāpi yatra tvāryasatyadarśanaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaprāptiśca prajñāyate tatra mukhyato yathārthānuśāsanaṃ bhagavataḥ śāstṛkarmasthitiḥ |
SA14n1147:1250: punarapi te devaputrāstathāgatānubhāvena samudaye tṛtīyakṣaṇākāraṃ pratipāditavanta ityāha |
SA14n1147:1252: tattvenānutpādarūpāpi saṃvṛtyā prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatāyāḥ samutpādiketi sarvabālajanātikrāntatvādāścaryam |
